字幕内容: Translation: Melts Timing: zhufree
Afternoon – Indoors – Nangong Jingnu and Qi Yan are reading while a maid brews tea
Nangong Jingnu: (Yawn)
Qi Yan: Are you tired
Nangong Jingnu: I’m not
字幕颜色: I just feel drowsy after reading for so long.

字幕内容: [Does a stretch]
Er-jie said that she’s coming over for dinner today. What time is it now?
Qi Yan: There’s still two hours before dinner.
If you feel drowsy
column5: you could nap for a while.

字幕内容: Nangong Jingnu: Mm… Sure. I’ll just nap for a short while.
Too long and I’ll wake up with a headache.
Qi Yan: [Flips a page] All right.
[Stands and walks to the couch]
[Nangong Jingnu falls asleep]
[Qi Yan continues to read]
[Qi Yan walks up to the couch and wakes Nangong Jingnu]
Qi Yan: [Pats Jingnu gently] Your Highness? Your Highness?
Nangong Jingnu: [Sits up] Mm… How long was I asleep?
Qi Yan: Half an hour. The Zhuohua Highness should be arriving soon.
Nangong Jingnu: Mm! Let’s go.
We can have a stroll around the courtyard while waiting for er-jie!
[Nangong Jingnu gets up and pulls Qi Yan to the door]
Qi Yan: Hey…
[They leave the room and close the door]
